InputHandler module

class InputHandler.InputHandler(window, actor)[source]

Bases: object

class for handling input from keyboard

handle_input()[source]
this method checks which key is present in input_buffer and returns command_buffer array that contains command

objects

Returns:

command buffer

keydown(e)[source]

detects key being pressed and adds it to input_buffer :param e: event

keyup(e)[source]

detects key being released and removes it from input_buffer :param e: event
